\begin{picture}(100,100)
\put(0,0){
\Qcircuit @C=1.5em @R=1em {
	\lstick{q_0:~\ket{n_1}} &  \gate{R(\phi_1)} & \multigate{1}{BS} & \qw & \multigate{1}{BS} & \qw& \multigate{1}{BS} &\measureD{\hat{n}}\\
	\lstick{q_1:~\ket{n_2}} &  \gate{R(\phi_2)} & \ghost{BS} & \multigate{1}{BS}& \ghost{BS} & \multigate{1}{BS} & \ghost{BS}&\measureD{\hat{n}}\\
	\lstick{q_2:~\ket{n_3}} &  \gate{R(\phi_3)} & \multigate{1}{BS} & \ghost{BS} & \multigate{1}{BS} & \ghost{BS}& \multigate{1}{BS}&\measureD{\hat{n}}\\
	\lstick{q_3:~\ket{n_4}} &  \gate{R(\phi_4)} & \ghost{BS} & \qw & \ghost{BS} & \qw  & \ghost{BS}&\measureD{\hat{n}}
}
}

\end{picture}
